article_title: The $18 trillion issue the Democrats missed during the debate
article_text:

twitter.description: Much of Tuesday night’s Democratic primary debate was about spending. About more spending, obviously. The candidates outdid themselves. Frontrunners Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders advocated s...
twitter.title: The $18 trillion problem the Democrats missed during the debate

article_metadata.keywords: democratic debate, hillary clinton, bernie sanders, u.s. debt, anderson cooper, cnn
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: 2016 Democratic Debate, Bernie Sanders, Commentary, Hillary Clinton, U.S. debt
article_metadata.description: While candidates offered numerous plans to boost the U.S. economy, they neglected to address America's debt problems.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: The $18 trillion problem the Democrats missed during the debate
